title: Invitation Font?
content:
Trying to find the fonts used in this invitation?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823014031im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_3588.jpg)
author: gafferino

comments.content:
ALEX FISHER/CARRIE WOODLAND: [Men In Black Credits](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823014031/http:/www.dafont.com/men-in-black-credits.font)  
OCTOBER 5TH, 2013: [Return to Sender](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823014031/http:/www.dafont.com/return-to-sender.font)  
For the rest, have a look to [Kimberley Geswein](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823014031/http:/www.dafont.com/kimberly-geswein.d1468)'s for substitutes.
